articles.description: If you pre-book the SpaceMax Family Hub you can get it for  ₹1,96,990. This pre-booking offer is only there till July 26. Pre-book offer includes Free Galaxy Note 10 Lite worth  ₹37,999 and  ₹9,000 cashback.
articles.content:
Samsung has added to their Internet of Things (IoT) product portfolio in India with the launch of the connected SpaceMax Family Hub Refrigerator today.

articles.title: Samsung's Mobile Business to Benefit Amid Anti-China Sentiment in India, Say Analysts - News18
articles.description: Analysts said the upbeat performance in India could push up Samsung’s overall mobile business, where Chinese players have dominated so far.
